## big

The big API

### current

The current slide

Type: [number][8]

### mode

The current mode, one of 'talk', 'print', or 'jump'

### forward

Move one slide forward

### reverse

Move one slide backward

### go

Go to a numbered slide

### length

The number of slides in this presentation

Type: [number][8]
